EXPRESSION: countryAggregates := sum(iBSIenriched group by COUNTRY,REF_DATE, AMOUNT_TYPE,BS_ITEM)
deposits := iBSI[filter BS_ITEM=4][rename OBS_VALUE to deposits];
iBSIenriched := inner_join (iBSI, RIAD using BSI_CODE, REF_DATE);
loans := iBSI[filter BS_ITEM=3][rename OBS_VALUE to loans];
sectorAggregates := sum(iBSIenriched group by SECTOR,REF_DATE, AMOUNT_TYPE,BS_ITEM)
totalAssets := iBSI[filter BS_ITEM=1][rename OBS_VALUE to totalAssets];
totalLiabilities := iBSI[filter BS_ITEM = 2][rename OBS_VALUE to totalLiabilites];
